name: Road Draw: Hill Climb Race
description:
Road Draw Monster truck is one of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving game ever made. In this game you have the opportunity to draw your world using different colors and lines. There are different modes in the game, in which you can create thanks to your imagination.

FEATURES:
- Innovative driving gameplay that is funny.
- Explore new physics dimensions.
- Addictive gameplay
- Amazing Graphics
- Makes you blink, think and then win.
- No need internet
- Suitable for all types of ages
- Your mission : climb the hill, draw the roads and keep your car safe through the obstacles.
- Beware of the shuriken and dangerous skulls while climbing through the roads you draw
- Lots of vehicles.
- Cars have different properties like engine power, suspension and grip. Some cars are great climbers and some of them are speed ​​enthusiastic.
- Draw the roads of your own style and beware of the obstacles.
- Collect coins, fuels and surprise coin packages while climbing hills.
- Play daily and get great bonuses.

What are you waiting for? DownloadRoad Draw Monster truck now!
